Question
========

From a randomly drawn sample of 5 women, the (normally distributed) weight (in kg.) was measured:‖ 55, 70, 61, 58, 66\ We want to test H~0~: μ=60. The test size to be used follows a

Answerlist
----------

* Standard normal distribution
* T-distribution with 3 degrees of freedom
* T-distribution with 4 degrees of freedom
* T-distribution with 5 degrees of freedom

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Standard normal distribution: Incorrect
* T-distribution with 3 degrees of freedom: Incorrect
* T-distribution with 4 degrees of freedom: Correct
* T-division with 5 degrees of freedom: Incorrect
